channel.title: So we got a phone that we didn't want, what do we do?
channel.description: Ok, so my dad was buying an iPhone 4 because it was only $1. However, it had to be shipped, so he asked for it to be cancelled and got an iPhone 4S instead. Now, the $1 was never refunded on his credit card, and guess what showed up a few days ago. So yeah, we have 2 iPhones now, and neither of us are sure what to do with the 4. Can we use it or not? The money paid for it was never refunded, but we still got the phone and it technically has no contract (which, in reality will make the phone cost $450 :| ). Should we return it or just wait to see what happens?

item.title: So we got a phone that we didn't want, what do we do?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:11, topic:465364”]An iphone for $1 no contract… what’s the catch?[/quote]It was with one. It’s $450 without so were seeing if we get charged that.

Read full topic

item.title: So we got a phone that we didn't want, what do we do?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:6, topic:465364”]does 2 year contract include unlimited texting and a good amount of data usage? if so i might be switching to AT&T.[/quote]Unlimited text is with our family plan, so I’m not 100% about individual rates. Its $20 per month for 300MB of data, or $30 per month for 3GB.

Read full topic

item.title: So we got a phone that we didn't want, what do we do?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

If you got it for $1 with no strings attached, just wait until see what happens. If nothing happens, just sell it to someone for a couple hundred. Unless I’m misreading this completely.
